official_title: An Act to amend the Act of June 9, 1906, entitled "An Act granting land to the city of Albuquerque for public purposes" (34 Stat. 227), as amended.

summary.text: Grants land to the city of Albuquerque, New Mexico for public park purposes. States that no conveyance shall be made unless the city of Albuquerque has first entered into an agreement or other arrangement with the Secretary of the Interior providing assurances that such proceeds shall be used, and that lands so acquired shall thereafter be used, for public park purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act granting land to the city of Albuquerque for public purposes." approved June 9, 1906.
An Act to amend the Act of June 9, 1906, entitled "An Act granting land to the city of Albuquerque for public purposes" (34 Stat. 227), as amended.
